statements: UPDATE encrypted_data SET encrypted_at_rest = TRUE, encrypted_in_transit = TRUE WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE encrypted_data SET encrypted_in_transit = FALSE, sensitive_data = 'Updated sensitive data' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE encrypted_data SET encrypted_in_transit = TRUE, sensitive_data = 'Updated sensitive data' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE encrypted_data SET encrypted_at_rest = FALSE, sensitive_data = 'New sensitive value' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE user_data SET email='newemail@example.com', password='newpassword123' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE user_logs SET activity='logged out', timestamp='2022-03-15 10:30:00' WHERE log_id=5;
UPDATE user_data SET username = 'john_doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE user_logs SET timestamp = '2022-02-28 14:30:00', activity = 'Logged in' WHERE log_id = 456;
UPDATE users SET username = 'new_username' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE sensitive_data SET encrypted_data = 'new_encrypted_data' WHERE data_id = 5;
UPDATE users SET username='john_doe', email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE sensitive_data SET encrypted_data='new_encrypted_data' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE encryption_at_rest SET data='new data 1' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE user_privacy SET email='newemail@example.com', username='newusername' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE encryption_at_rest SET data='updated_data', timestamp=NOW(), id=1 WHERE id=1
UPDATE user_privacy SET email='new_email@example.com', password='new_password123' WHERE username='john_doe'
UPDATE encrypted_users SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE encrypted_messages SET sender_id = 100, receiver_id = 200 WHERE message_id = 5;
UPDATE encrypted_users SET username = 'alice_smith' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE encrypted_messages SET message_text = 'Hello, how are you?' WHERE message_id = 10 AND receiver_id = 2;
